description:
Ashikawa Yoshihiko is the head of http://anidb.net/ch93277 [Nitta]`s http://anidb.net/ch95617 [yakuza group]. He eventually retires from his position due his advanced age and poor health, but maintains much of his influence. He dotes on http://anidb.net/ch93274 [Hina] in a grandfatherly way, even using yakuza resources to assist her in such situations as running for student council president, and encourages Nitta to take a more active interest in raising her.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ashikawa Yoshihiko
